proposal: Hello Injective community! Congrats on your impressive 25978 holders in the BSC network, that's no small feat! As you continue to pioneer the new financial system, ever thought of adding a DEX or a blockchain-based lottery to your ecosystem? They're just a couple of the B2B tools we offer. See my profile for demo and details. Don't worry, we're not here to play, we're here to build alongside you.
